div.div:
Township buildings are experiencing technical issues with our phones and network connection.
Thank you for your patience and cooperation while we work to resolve these issues.

div.h3: Ypsilanti Township Offices CLOSED for Labor Day Sept 2nd
div.div:
Civic Center, 14B Court, Community Center, & Compost Site CLOSED September 2nd.
Curbside Collection one-day delay.

div.h3: Sugarbrook Water Main & Pavement Project: Notice of Construction & Intermittent Water Shutdowns
div.div: Project estimated to last from August 2024 to spring 2025.

div.h3: Divot Dash 5K at Green Oaks Golf Course Oct 5th
div.div: Make your way around the course passing fairways, bunkers, ponds and greens. Register early for a discounted rate!

div.h3: Flying Into Autumn Craft Show at North Bay Park Oct 12th
div.div: Join us on Saturday, October 12, 2024 from 10:00am - 4:00pm at North Bay Park.
The project is expected to be complete by the end of August.

div.h3: Green Oaks Golf Course Restroom Renovations

div.div:
New flooring in the Ballroom, Gameroom, and the Dance Studio along with renovated bathrooms!
Update posted July 16th.

Ford Lake Park shelters under construction will be blocked off to the public.
Update posted July 16th.
Free KN95 masks and iHealth COVID testing kits are ready for pick-up at the Civic Center & Community Center.
